title: 2021 Week 15 Preview
itunes:title: 2021 Week 15 Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview every single upcoming game of Week 15, starting with the two Saturday games, including a lock-off during the Patriots-at-Colts discussion, and the two primetime games on Sunday and Monday night. Then the draft kicks off with a shocking draft day trade! And we get a surprise appearance from The Rainmaker.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
